member.summary:
ThrottledPackageRestoreAsync method throttles the number of tasks created to perform package restore in parallel The maximum number of parallel tasks that may be created can be specified via
The method creates a ConcurrentQueue of passed in . And, creates a fixed number of tasks that dequeue from the ConcurrentQueue and perform package restore. So, this method should pre-populate the queue and must not enqueued to by other methods

ThrottledCopySatelliteFilesAsync method throttles the number of tasks created to perform copy satellite files in parallel The maximum number of parallel tasks that may be created can be specified via

Framework for determining the dependency groups of packages
The resource to fetch dependency info from. Could be http/file feed/global packages folder/solution packages folder.
Caching context. Only really applicable when the dependency info resource is http based.
